DOC.TEXT: McGurk Gets Senior Disney Post : Chris McGurk was named president of the Walt Disney Motion_Pictures Group , making him responsible_for business_activities as well as international theatrical distribution , film acquisitions , Miramax Films , Hollywood Records and Disney theatrical_productions such_as the Broadway production of " Beauty and the Beast. " McGurk joined Disney in 1988 as senior_vice_president of finance .
